name: execute_edu_credential
body: msg ! ("Executing execute_edu_credential for 教育認証発行（EduCredential）") ;
let mut acct_data = EduCredentialAccount :: try_from (& ctx . accounts . account_a . to_account_info ()) ? ;
acct_data . dummy = acct_data . dummy . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: account_a
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: expecting EduCredentialAccount but using UncheckedAccount"]

fields.name: account_b
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: expecting EduCredentialAccount but using UncheckedAccount"]
